title: 110: Merciless Mortal Combat! Luffy vs. Crocodile! - Never Watched One Piece
author: neverwatchedonepiece
description: A first-time viewer's reaction and analysis of Episode 110, discussing the surprising pacing and dramatic ending with Luffy being impaled by Crocodile's hook.

title: CROCODILE vs LUFFY! One Piece Ep 109 & 110 REACTION & REVIEW
author: Unknown Reactor
description: A reaction and review video covering One Piece episodes 109 and 110, focusing on the intense battle between Crocodile and Luffy.

title: Every Luffy Vs. Crocodile Fight in One Piece & The Winner
author: CBR
description: An analysis of all three fights between Luffy and Crocodile during the Arabasta Arc, discussing each round's outcome and significance. Covers the first battle in Episode 110 where Luffy was wholly unprepared for Crocodile's Logia powers.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for the complete Luffy vs Crocodile fight series through Episode 122

title: Luffy vs. Crocodile: Who Won the Fight? (& Is He Really Stronger?)
author: Fiction Horizon
description: An in-depth analysis comparing Luffy and Crocodile's strengths, discussing how Luffy won despite being weaker, and analyzing the significance of their battles. Notes that Crocodile won Round 1 decisively.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for all Luffy vs Crocodile fights

title: One Piece: Should Luffy Have Lost To Crocodile?
author: GameRant
description: An editorial examining whether Luffy's eventual victory over Crocodile was realistic given their power difference. Discusses how Luffy was defeated twice, including the devastating loss in Episode 110.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for the complete Arabasta Arc battle sequence

title: One Piece #110 - Merciless Fight to the Death! Luffy vs. Crocodile
author: Comic Vine
description: Database entry for Episode 110 with episode information, user ratings, and community discussion.

title: One Piece - Nasake Muyou no Shitou! Luffy vs Crocodile (Episode 110)
author: IMDB
description: IMDB page for Episode 110 with a 9.1/10 rating. User reviews describe it as 'intense, thrilling and honestly edge of your seat' with 'some of the best animation' showing 'how powerful Crocodile is.'
